backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, accounts, transactions, market data types, and secure access-controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs with high-level metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of concise summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining backend mode and REST API base URL for the user portal.
frontend/admin-portal/.env.example: Example environment file specifying admin portal backend mode, URLs, and environment settings.
frontend/admin-portal/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the admin React app at admin-root and loads main.tsx.
frontend/admin-portal/README.md: Explains the admin portal’s purpose, features, environment setup, and how to run it alongside the user portal.
frontend/admin-portal/src/AdminApp.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, authentication, and layout wrappers for the admin portal’s root app.
frontend/admin-portal/src/backend/adminB: Placeholder backend client supporting IC/REST modes with stub admin operations.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/aut: Route guard that restricts access to authenticated admin users and redirects unauthorized users.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/lay: Header bar with navigation, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling for admin users.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and themed background for admin pages.
frontend/admin-portal/src/config/env.ts: Loads and validates admin-specific environment variables for IC/REST backend modes.
frontend/admin-portal/src/contexts/Admin: Implements localStorage-based admin authentication with signup, login, logout, and session management.
frontend/admin-portal/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the admin React app and renders AdminApp into the admin-root element.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AccessDe: Access denied screen shown when a non-admin attempts to access restricted pages.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminDas: Displays the admin dashboard with basic system stats placeholders and upcoming feature notes.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminFor: Renders a demo admin password reset form that collects an email and shows a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminLog: Implements the admin login form with authentication, error handling, and redirects for authenticated users.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminSig: Provides an admin signup form with validation, error handling, and redirects on successful account creation.
frontend/admin-portal/src/styles/admin.c: Imports the shared global stylesheet from the main frontend.
frontend/DELIVERY_PLAN_BATCHES.md: Batch-based delivery plan outlining file groups and build order for user and admin portals.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the app and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and setup guide explaining user and admin portals, authentication, and development workflow.
frontend/REST_BACKEND_CONTRACT.md: Specification document detailing the REST API contract and required security considerations for the Node backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application's routing, providers, and protected routes within the main AppShell layout.
frontend/src/backendClient/config.ts: Loads and validates backend mode configuration from environment variables for IC or REST operation.
frontend/src/backendClient/icClient.ts: Implements a backend client that forwards calls to an Internet Computer actor for user data, settings, and transactions.
frontend/src/backendClient/index.ts: Factory that returns a cached IC or REST backend client based on config and supports cache clearing.
frontend/src/backendClient/restClient.ts: Implements a REST-based BackendClient using fetch with auth headers, bigint-safe JSON handling, and wrappers for profile, balance, transactions, and market data endpoints.
frontend/src/backendClient/types.ts: Defines the BackendClient interface and related config types, specifying all API operations the frontend can call.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users and showing a loading spinner while auth state initializes.
Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the footer with branding, disclaimer text, and credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the main navigation header with theme toggle, account menu, mobile menu, and auth-aware navigation.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Implements a localStorage-based demo auth system supporting signup, login, logout, and session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an IC backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and exposes functions to login or clear identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, balance, statements, and transactions, supporting both REST and actor-based modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Syncs backend settings with UI theme and provides a toggle for dark/light mode, updating backend preferences when authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables for light and dark themes, and utility classes including background wave images.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays balance and financial health metrics using charts and cards, pulling data via custom hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows an overview of user profile, balance, recent transactions, and quick navigation actions with logout capability.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Implements a demo password reset flow with email input and confirmation messaging.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that handles user authentication with email and password, showing errors and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MarketInsightsPage.ts: Displays simulated Indian market data with summary cards and a detailed table, showing loading skeletons while fetching.
frontend/src/pages/MutualFundsPage.tsx: Shows simulated mutual fund data with performance cards and a detailed table, including loading states and change indicators.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: User settings page allowing profile updates and theme toggling, with form handling and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page that creates new accounts with validation for name, email, and passwords, then redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Renders the account statements page with filters, search, date range selection, and CSV export for transactions.
frontend/src/pages/StocksPage.tsx: Displays simulated stock data with summary cards and a full table, handling loading states and formatting values.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts transactions to CSV format and triggers a browser download with proper escaping and metadata.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides INR currency formatting helpers for bigint and decimal values.
frontend/src/utils/jsonBigint.ts: Adds JSON stringify/parse helpers that convert bigint fields to and from strings for API compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s current state, requirements, architecture notes, and planned banking features.
